no.kartverket.glrenderer

Class OpenGlMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.kartverket.glrenderer.OpenGlMesh

  • public class OpenGlMesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Mesh class that knows how to generate its VBOs and indices to be drawn in OpenGL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenGlMesh

        public OpenGlMesh(float[] vertices,
                  int vertexCoordNumber,
                  float[] texCoords,
                  int texCoordNumber,
                  short[] indices)
        Create an OpenGL mesh.
        Parameters:
        vertices - Array of vertex positions.
        vertexCoordNumber - Number of coordinates per vertex position.
        texCoords - Array of texture coordinates.
        texCoordNumber - Number of coordinates per texcoord.
        indices - Array of indices.
